resources.name: etiquetas.io ESL CLOUD API
resources.description:
Atualizada em: 06/11/2022 às 14:56  (Status: Finalizada)

Este documento é principalmente para usuários que precisam integrar ERP
sistema com sistema ESL CLOUD da etiquetas.io. 
Neste documento, você pode encontrar facilmente como enviar dados da plataforma ERP para a nossa
plataforma ESL.

Observação:

1. Como o tempo de desenvolvimento de diferentes interfaces pode ser
diferente, o mesmo objeto pode ser nomeado de forma diferente (como
Segue).

(1) "priceTagCode", "priceTagBarCode" e "eslBarcode" em
todos os documentos referem-se a códigos de barras de etiquetas de preços.
(2) "barCode", "itemBarcode" e "itemBarCode" no
documento todos referem-se ao código de barras do produto.

2. A coluna "nome da variável" nos parâmetros de solicitação de
este documento distingue os tipos de parâmetros de acordo com
a cor. Preto é o tipo de corpo, por favor, coloque-o no
corpo da solicitação, azul é o tipo de consulta, coloque-o no
URL de solicitação, vermelho é o tipo de cabeçalho, coloque-o no
cabeçalho da solicitação. Todas as interfaces funcionais precisam ser adicionadas
token no cabeçalho da solicitação para autenticação (autorização:
símbolo).

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
Faz login na plataforma ESL CLOUD da etiquetas.io

Para se autenticar, por favor, criptografe a sua senha primeiro em:

 https://the-x.cn/Cryptography/Rsa.aspx
 
#### Definição dos Parâmetros de Entrada do Body
 
Field | Variable | Type | Length | Necessary | Remark
----- | -------- | ---- | ------ | --------- | -------- 
Account | account | String | 100 | true 
Password | password | String | 1000 | true | Pass after encryption 
Type | loginType  | Integer | 1 | true | 3

#### Parâmetros de Resposta

Field | Variable | Type | Remark 
----- | -------- | ---- | --------
Success | success | Boolean | true/false 
Status | code | Integer 
Note | message | String
Response | data | Json
Role code | roleCode | Integer
User | userName | String
Token | token | String
User info | currentUser | Json
User ID | id | Integer 
Account | account | String
Password | password | String
Role ID | roleId | Integer
Agency ID | agencyId | Integer
Agency name | agencyName | String
Merchant ID | merchantId | Integer
Merchant name | merchantName | String
Store ID | storeId | Integer
Store name | storeName | String
Enable | enable | Integer | 0:Disabled 1:Enabled 
Validity | flag | Integer | 0:invalid 1:valid
Name | name | String 
Phone | phone | String
Email | email | String
Create time | createTime | Date
Last login time | lastLoginTime | Date

resources.name: Importar Itens ( ex. Produtos )
resources.description:
Endpoint para importação de Itens (ex. Produtos)

Importar produtos para o sistema ESL através de chamada http

1) Na primeira vez, os produtos importados serão sincronizados para todas as lojas
sob o comerciante. Quando as informações modificadas para uma loja separada são
retransmitida, as informações modificadas só serão transmitidas ao
loja correspondente.

2) Ao importar produtos pela interface, caso o storeId esteja vazio,
Importar os produtos para a lista de mercadorias que influenciará todas as lojas.
Quando o storeId for preenchido, as informações do produto importado serão apenas
importado para a loja correspondente.

####Definição de Interface

Parâmetro | Valor
--------- | --------------------------------------
URL | http://[server address]:9999/item/batchImportItem
Example | https://api.etiquetas.io/item/batchImportItem
Request | POST
Content | application/json;charset=utf-{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}

Parameter | Field | Variable | Type | Length Necessary | Remark
------------- | ------------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ------
Authorization | Authorization | String | true | token
Store ID | storeId | Integer | 20 | true
Merchant ID | merchantId | Integer | 20 | true
Agency ID | agencyId | Integer | 20 | true
Price unit | unitName | Integer | 4 | false | 0 : Fen 1 : Yuan | Commodity | 
itemList | List<Item> | true | Commodity 
barcode | barCode | String | 100 | true | Unique code for commodty
Template category | attrCategory | String | 100 | true  
Template type | attrName | String | 100 | true
Commodity | code | productCode | String | 100 | false 
sku | productSku | String | 100 | false | Commodity
title | itemTitle | String | 500 | false | Commodity
shortTitle | String | 500 | false | abbreviation 
Level | classLevel | String | 100 | false 
Area | productArea | String | 100 | false
Selling unit | unit | String | 100 | false
QR code | qrCode | String | 1000 | false | URL 
NFC link | nfcUrl | String | 1000 | false
Specification | spec | String | 100 | false
Original price | originalPrice | BigDecimal | false  | 0~99999999.99 
Price | price | BigDecimal | false | 0~99999999.99
VIP price | memberPrice | BigDecimal | false | 0~99999999.99
Stock1 | stock1 | BigDecimal | false | 0~99999999.999
Stock2 | stock2 | BigDecimal | false | 0~99999999.999
Stock3 | stock3 | BigDecimal | false | 0~99999999.999
Promotion | promotionText | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature1 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature2 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature3 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature4 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature5 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature6 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature7 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature8 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature9 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature10 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature11 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature12 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | CustFeature13 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature14 | String | 1000 | false
Expand field | custFeature15 | String | 1000 | false

```response:200
{
"success": true,
"code": 17002,
"data": null,
"message": " successful import of merchandise "
}
```

```response:400
{
"success": false,
"code": 11111,
"data": null,
"message": " productArea too long "
}
```

Number of items per page | size | Integer | false | Default : 10

itemTitle | String | 500 | false

Time | lightTime |  Integer | true | unit：s，no more than4 hours
Target | targetExecution | String | true
Commodity | barcode/name，“1” for all commodities

resources.name: Listar Itens (ex. Produtos)
resources.description:
Consulta ou Lista um iten ( ex. Produto )

####Definição de Interface

Parâmetro | Valor
--------- | --------------------------------------
URL | http://[server address]:9999/erp/item/list
Example | https://api.etiquetas.io/erp/item/list
Request | POST
Content | application/json;charset=utf-8

####Parâmetros do Body

Parameter | Field | Variable | Type | Length Necessary | Remark
------------- | ------------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ------
Authorize | Authorization | String | true | The token value returned by the login interface
page number | page | Integer | false | Default: 1 (page 1)
Articles perpage | size | Integer | false | Default: 1 0 | use or not
External store ID | useExternalStoreId | Integer | false | 0: not used 1: used
External store ID | externalStoreId | String | false | If an external store ID is used, this field must be passed
Store ID | storeId | Integer | 2 0 | false | Return by default ifnot passed
Merchant-level | product | information, whichcan be replaced byan external storeID
Template classification | attrClass | String | 6 0 | false | 
Template properties | attrName | String | 500 | false
productname | pcItemTitle | String | 6 0 | false
barcode | pcBarCode | String | 2 0 | false | 
productlabel | label | String | 6 0 | false
commoditycode | pcProductCode | String | 1 00 | false

"spec": "",

https://api.etiquetas.io/erp/item/list ?page=1&size=10

"storeId": 1571661761656,
"attrClass": " default ",
"attrName": " default "
}

Request example 2 (using external store ID)

externalStoreId=100012

"attrName": " default "
}

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Use o token que é gerado dinamicamente a cada Login

resources.name: ESL Relação
resources.description:
Inquire information about single ESL bound to a merchant

####Definição de Interface

Parâmetro | Valor
--------- | --------------------------------------
URL | http://[server address]:9999/bind/geyPriceTagByPriceTagBarCode
Example | https://api.etiquetas.io/bind/geyPriceTagByPriceTagBarCode
Request | POST
Content | application/json;charset=utf-8

####Parâmetros do Body

Parameter | Field | Variable | Type | Length Necessary | Remark
------------- | ------------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ------
Authorization | Authorization | String | true | token
ESL | barcode | priceTagBarCode | String | true

####Parâmetros de Resposta

Field | Variable | Type | Remark
----- | -------- | ---- | -----------
Success | success | Boolean | true/false
Status | code | Integer 
Note | message | String
Response | data | Json
																																	 
																																	 

```response:200
{
"success": true,
"code": 15067,
"message": "查询价签信息成功",
"data": {
"tagBarCode": "A0A3B8204C96",
"shelfNum": null,
"itemBarCode": null,
"itemTitle": null,
"itemPrice": null,
"state": 0,
"upgradeState": 5,
"softVersion": "2.1.34",
"model": "ZKC21S",
"lastCommuTime": "2021-09-23 17:11:20",
"id": 391635,
"mac": "A0A3B80D23D0",
"apSignal": null,
"battery": 100,
"batteryLevel": 5,
"storeName": "hsb",
"tagMac": "A0A3B8204C96",
"items": [
{
"itemBarCode": "123456789",
"itemTitle": "红富士苹果",
"itemPrice": 3
}
]
}
}
```

```response:400
{
"success": false,
"code": 13040,
"message": "不存在绑定关系",
"data": null
}
```

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Use o token que é gerado dinamicamente a cada Login

resources.name: Lista de Erros
resources.description:
Return | Message | Explanation
------ | ------- | ---------------------
10006 | 登录过期,请重新登录 | Login expirado, por favor tente novamente
10009 | 参数错误 | Erro de Parâmetro
10039 | 图片序号只能为 1-10 | O número de sequência de imagens só pode ser entre 1-10
10041 | 图片文件不能为空 | Arquivo da imagem não pode ser vazio
10043 | 价签参数错误 | Erro no Parâmetro da etiqueta de preço
10037 | 图片格式不正确 | Formato de Imagem incorreto
10038 | 图片尺寸过大 | Tamanho da imagem é muito grande
10041 | 图片文件不能为空 | O Arquivo da imagem não pode ser vazio
10042 | 图片尺寸不匹配 | O Tamanho da imagem não bate
14043 | 用户名或密码错误 | nome de usuári ou senha inválida
14018 | 用户名不存在 | Nome de usuário não existe
14022 | 用户已禁用 | Usuário desativado
14031 | 权限不足 | Permissões insuficientes
14038 | 该账号被禁用 | A conta está desativada
15060 | 找不到该设备 | Não encontrei o dispositivo
15059 | AP 已存在 | A Rádio Base já existe
19001 | 商品列表为空 | A lista de produtos está vazia
19002 | 商品列表 Length 大于 500 | O tamanho da lista de Produtos é maior que 500
19003 | Store ID 不匹配 | O Store ID não bate
19003 | Merchant ID 不匹配 | O Merchant ID não bate
19003 | 代理商 id 不匹配 | O Agency id não bate
19004 | 促销开始时间格式错误 | O formato do Tempo de Promoção está errado
19005 | 促销结束时间格式错误 | O Formato do tempo de Término de Promoção está errado
19006 | Store ID 不能为空 | Store ID não pode ser vazio
19010 | 价格格式错误 | Formátio de preço inválido
19011 | 原价格式错误 | Erro no Preço Original 
19012 | 会员价格式错误 | Preço para Membro inválido
19013 | 时间格式不正确 | Formato de Hora incorreto
19014 | 商品 Length 列表大于 20000 | O tamanho limite da lista de Produtos é maior que 20.000, não ultrapasse esse limite.
20008 | 该商品未绑定价签 | Este produto não está associado (bind) a nenhuma etiqueta eletrônica (ESL )

resources.name: Link
resources.description:

resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about
    Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net,
    #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key
    `special-key` to test the authorization filters."
  version: 1.0.2
  title: etiquetas.io ESL CLOUD API
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  contact:
    email: suporte@etiquetas.io
  license:
    name: etiquetas.io
    url: https://etiquetas.io
tags:
  - name: pet
    description: Everything about your Pets
    externalDocs:
      description: Find out more
      url: http://swagger.io
  - name: store
    description: Access to Petstore orders
  - name: user
    description: Operations about user
    externalDocs:
      description: Find out more about our store
      url: http://swagger.io
paths:
  /pet:
    post:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Add a new pet to the store
      description: ""
      operationId: addPet
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Pet"
      responses:
        "405":
          description: Invalid input
    put:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Update an existing pet
      description: ""
      operationId: updatePet
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Pet"
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        "404":
          description: Pet not found
        "405":
          description: Validation exception
  /pet/findByStatus:
    get:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Finds Pets by status
      description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings
      operationId: findPetsByStatus
      parameters:
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: Status values that need to be considered for filter
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              enum:
                - available
                - pending
                - sold
              default: available
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        "400":
          description: Invalid status value
  /pet/findByTags:
    get:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Finds Pets by tags
      description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1,
        tag2, tag3 for testing.
      operationId: findPetsByTags
      parameters:
        - name: tags
          in: query
          description: Tags to filter by
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        "400":
          description: Invalid tag value
      deprecated: true
  "/pet/{petId}":
    get:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Find pet by ID
      description: Returns a single pet
      operationId: getPetById
      parameters:
        - name: petId
          in: path
          description: ID of pet to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        "400":
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        "404":
          description: Pet not found
    post:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data
      description: ""
      operationId: updatePetWithForm
      parameters:
        - name: petId
          in: path
          description: ID of pet that needs to be updated
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  description: Updated name of the pet
                  type: string
                status:
                  description: Updated status of the pet
                  type: string
      responses:
        "405":
          description: Invalid input
    delete:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Deletes a pet
      description: ""
      operationId: deletePet
      parameters:
        - name: api_key
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: petId
          in: path
          description: Pet id to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        "404":
          description: Pet not found
  /store/inventory:
    get:
      tags:
        - store
      summary: Returns pet inventories by status
      description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities
      operationId: getInventory
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
  /store/order:
    post:
      tags:
        - store
      summary: Place an order for a pet
      description: ""
      operationId: placeOrder
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Order"
        description: order placed for purchasing the pet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Order"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Order"
        "400":
          description: Invalid Order
  "/store/order/{orderId}":
    get:
      tags:
        - store
      summary: Find purchase order by ID
      description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10. Other
        values will generated exceptions
      operationId: getOrderById
      parameters:
        - name: orderId
          in: path
          description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 10
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Order"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Order"
        "400":
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        "404":
          description: Order not found
    delete:
      tags:
        - store
      summary: Delete purchase order by ID
      description: For valid response try integer IDs with positive integer value. Negative
        or non-integer values will generate API errors
      operationId: deleteOrder
      parameters:
        - name: orderId
          in: path
          description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            minimum: 1
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        "404":
          description: Order not found
  /user:
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Create user
      description: This can only be done by the logged in user.
      operationId: createUser
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        description: Created user object
        required: true
      responses:
        default:
          description: successful operation
  /user/createWithArray:
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Creates list of users with given input array
      description: ""
      operationId: createUsersWithArrayInput
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/UserArray"
      responses:
        default:
          description: successful operation
  /user/createWithList:
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Creates list of users with given input array
      description: ""
      operationId: createUsersWithListInput
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/UserArray"
      responses:
        default:
          description: successful operation
  /user/login:
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Logs user into the system
      description: ""
      operationId: loginUser
      parameters:
        - name: username
          in: query
          description: The user name for login
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: password
          in: query
          description: The password for login in clear text
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          headers:
            X-Rate-Limit:
              description: calls per hour allowed by the user
              schema:
                type: integer
                format: int32
            X-Expires-After:
              description: date in UTC when token expires
              schema:
                type: string
                format: date-time
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: string
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        "400":
          description: Invalid username/password supplied
  /user/logout:
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Logs out current logged in user session
      description: ""
      operationId: logoutUser
      responses:
        default:
          description: successful operation
  "/user/{username}":
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Get user by user name
      description: ""
      operationId: getUserByName
      parameters:
        - name: username
          in: path
          description: "The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing. "
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          description: Invalid username supplied
        "404":
          description: User not found
    put:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Updated user
      description: This can only be done by the logged in user.
      operationId: updateUser
      parameters:
        - name: username
          in: path
          description: name that need to be updated
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        description: Updated user object
        required: true
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid user supplied
        "404":
          description: User not found
    delete:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Delete user
      description: This can only be done by the logged in user.
      operationId: deleteUser
      parameters:
        - name: username
          in: path
          description: The name that needs to be deleted
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid username supplied
        "404":
          description: User not found
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about Swagger
  url: http://swagger.io
servers:
  - url: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2
components:
  requestBodies:
    UserArray:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
      description: List of user object
      required: true
    Pet:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        application/xml:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
      description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
      required: true
  schemas:
    Order:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        petId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        quantity:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        shipDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        status:
          type: string
          description: Order Status
          enum:
            - placed
            - approved
            - delivered
        complete:
          type: boolean
          default: false
      xml:
        name: Order
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        username:
          type: string
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        password:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
        userStatus:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          description: User Status
      xml:
        name: User
    Category:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
      xml:
        name: Category
    Tag:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
      xml:
        name: Tag
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - photoUrls
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        category:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Category"
        name:
          type: string
          example: doggie
        photoUrls:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: photoUrl
            wrapped: true
          items:
            type: string
        tags:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: tag
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Tag"
        status:
          type: string
          description: pet status in the store
          enum:
            - available
            - pending
            - sold
      xml:
        name: Pet
    ApiResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        type:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
